body_html: i'm going to close this issue. There hasn't been any movement in discussion, and I presume folks have developed their own solutions for this. The choice between making an input Tensor to be requires_grad=False or volatile=True is what we have failed to reach consensus on.

body: i'm going to close this issue. There hasn't been any movement in discussion, and I presume folks have developed their own solutions for this. The choice between making an input `Tensor` to be `requires_grad=False` or `volatile=True` is what we have failed to reach consensus on.
